product_name: Moving Comfort NoChill Gloves - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soft against your hands, the women's Moving Comfort NoChill gloves offer just the right amount of warmth while running in cold weather. The women's Moving Comfort NoChill gloves feature a mesh stash pocket on palms. Smooth face fabric with soft, brushed interior; soft terry fabric on thumb; finger tip and thumb gripper. Closeout.
short_description: Soft against your hands, the women's Moving Comfort NoChill gloves offer just the right amount of warmth while running in cold weather.
